content: 3 stitches double_crochet in the 4th and catch the last loop in the double_crochet this will secure the final loop double_crochet in the next 7 stitches double_crochet in the 8th and catch the last loop double_crochet in the last 3 stitches put the two short edges together and sew up using a slip_stitch sew in your ends and you re done
